snippet: Behind the scenes, where he holds court with political and business leaders as a community activist, Dr. Steven M. Safyer has become one of the most powerful figures in the Bronx.
abstract: Montefiore Medical Center president Dr Steven M Safyer, while preferring to remain behind the scenes, holds court with political and business leaders as a community activist; he is becoming one of most powerful figures in the Bronx, borough of 1.4 million residents facing growing health crisis from obesity and other chronic diseases.
lead_paragraph: Behind the scenes, where he holds court with political and business leaders as a community activist, Dr. Steven M. Safyer has become one of the most powerful figures in the Bronx.

headline.seo: Montefiore’s President, Influential in Albany, Is Unknown by Design
headline.main: Montefiore’s President, Influential in Albany, Is Unknown by Design
headline.print_headline: Montefiore’s President, Influential in Albany, Is Unknown by Design
